channel.title: Need help rippin on my friend
channel.description: call my friend 978 887 6574 you can *67 its fun to call and if he answers pretend your gay or something if he doesnt answer leave messages. :D :D :D

item.title: Need help rippin on my friend
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

All you need is a telephone number and you can get peoples adress and name, or visa versa. Time to pwn him with spam mail to his home!

and that info is 100% factual, according to the cell phone number that was given.

item.title: Need help rippin on my friend
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“footballplayar34, post:16, topic:53279”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=75099.msg844662#msg844662 date=1170221421]

and if he answers pretend your gay

Why don’t you call him.

It’s less work.

Because you don’t need to pretend.

i do call him and do rip on him in school all the time, but he knows when i do it and i went into the gay chat rooms at myspace and told them the phone umber and no one called =(.

any ways hes one of my best friends and he got arrested 6 months ago and so a lot of people rip on him cuz its funny as hell cuz he doesnt do anything back

You must have a lot of friends,treating them like that.
[/quote]

i have a lot of friends i only rip on him cuz its funny, everyone pretty muhc started rippin on him when he got probabtion cuz he couldnt do anything back or he would get sent to juvie[/quote]

Sounds like bullying to me.

Read full topic
